pages.title: Paltaeria
pages.text: The light blue color is the trademark of this ore. It is found exclusively in the End in small clusters.$(br2)Like the End itself, the curious properties of this material are not to be overlooked.

pages.title: Paltaeria Gem
pages.text: Rarely, an intact gem can be carved out and used in recipes for which fragments are too small. With effort, said fragments can also be made whole again.

pages.title: Paltaeria Floatblock
pages.text: From your previous experiences with Paltaeria, you can already guess that it would not be a good idea to place this block in open sky - your future self will thank you.
